name: Mean years of schooling, women (15 to 49) – Our World In Data (2017)
title: Mean years of schooling, women (15 to 49) – Our World In Data (2017)
description: Shown is the average of mean years of schooling for mean between 15 and 49 years of age. This is calculated as the average of the estimates published by Barro and Lee.
